attributes.action: Ban all  Alcoholic drinks In the palace of Westminster restaurants and bars
attributes.additional_details:
From facture workers to bus drivers people working on the railways  Health professionals. All Making potentially life changing decisions are not allowed to drink At work.
 Most occupations have random drug and alcohol tests to protect the general public  This should be introduced in Parliament.
I can't imagine my local Hospital serving Wine or spirits in there staff  Canteen. 
MP"S should lead by example
attributes.background: Bring MP's into line with the rest of the UK work force and not be allowed alcohol at work.
